title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Implementing Collaborative Teamwork for Computer Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete software design projects in teams of three using mobile collaboration tools.
Learners acquire the competency to evaluate teammates' code quality via peer review (based on a 4-level rubric).
Learners can perform weekly sprint retrospectives based on Agile methodology with over 80% participation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
